person.persName: John R. Grissom (Provost Marshal, 2nd Military District of Kentucky)

body.p: Kentucky tailor and soldier. Lived in Owensboro, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Augustus Grissom. Father of John R. Grissom, Jr. Served as a captain and provost marshal for the 2nd District of Kentucky from 1863 to 1865.
